column4: Silver try using the locate command, or open synaptics and look up the list of installed files

help! how to configure wicd with a WEP index key ? I did amend the relevant variable within the AP conf file, but it seems to e systematically overriden. Is there a trick ? Currently under microsoft just the time to find the solution, unfortunately wicd web site and faqs don't even mention the subject ? thanks..
Wicd is not part of Ubuntu, its a 3rd party program
I know this, however since NetworkManager fails to deal correctly with WPA -- wicd is a brilliant workaround
